name: Sega Genesis Classic Collection Gold
summary:
Sega Mega Drive Classic Collection Gold Edition, also known as Sega Genesis Classic Collection Gold Edition, is a collection of Sega Mega Drive games re-released for for Windows-based PCs published by Sega, and the sequel to Sega Mega Drive Classic Collection - Volume 4.[1] It acts as a definitive collection, collecting all four previous collections, for forty-six emulated Sega Mega Drive games in total.

Sega Genesis Classic Collection: Gold Edition has configuring keyboard support which provides a personalized gaming experience, as well as a multiplayer mode for a select number of titles. A save and load functionality is included in every game.
